title: Dataset concept (OpenEBench Benchmarking Data Model schemas)
$comment: allOf and placeholders inspired by https://stackoverflow.com/a/24365393

_id.title: The unique id of the dataset, according to the rules

_schema.title: The JSON schema absolute URI. It must match the value of '$id' in the JSON schema

references.title: The reference id(s) of this dataset (if any)

description.title: Long dataset description, written in Markdown

community_ids.title: The communities where this dataset was generated or used
community_ids.description: This field is redundant, as it can be obtained from the challenges

challenge_ids.title: The challenge(s) where this dataset was generated or used

visibility.title: The visibility of this dataset, which must be acknowledged by the APIs

version.title: Version (or relelase date) of the dataset

modification.title: Last modification date of the dataset

public.title: The date when this dataset becomes public

type.title: Type of dataset. Aggregation datasets are combinations of other aggregations or assessments.

datalinks.title: The data itself, either linked or embedded, and mirrors to it

schema_url.title: The optional URL to the JSON Schema which validates the inline data. It could be embedded, using the 'data:' protocol encoding

oneOf.title: The link to reach the dataset

dataset_contact_ids.title: The contact id(s) of the depositor(s)/creator(s) of this dataset

depends_on.title: The causal, direct dependencies of this dataset on a tool and other datasets, if available

metrics_id.title: The id of the metrics tied to the tool id

tool_id.title: The id of the tool which generated this dataset

dataset_id.title: The id of a dataset which was used to generate this new dataset

role.title: The role of the referenced dataset generating the current one (used to generate the current dataset, superseded by the generated dataset, ....)

DataLink.title: The link to reach the dataset

uri.title: Either inline, encoded data URI; or an official CURIE; or download link to the dataset itself, like an FTP directory or archive, an S3 bucket, a WebDAV directory, an HTTP REST link, etc...; or a link to a Metalink describing the dataset; or a link to a MD5/SHA1 sums file with relative paths

schema_uri.title: The optional URI to the JSON Schema which validates the remote data, in case it is either JSON or YAML

attrs.title: Attributes describing the datalink: whether it is inline (i.e. a data URI); a CURIE; whether it is compressed, or an archive (tar, zip, rar), a metalink (RFC 5854, RFC 6249, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Metalink) or a standard sums (MD5, SHA1) file

kind.documentation: Nature of the pointed resource. It can be the authoritative (primary) source, a mirror, or a permanent fixed URI, like Zenodo, B2DROP or similar

validation_date.title: Last validation date of the datalink

status.title: Last validation status (unreachable content, missing content(404), interrupted while validating, corrupted (checksums, not all the contents available, etc...), ok) or the HTTP code (numerical)
